strength: Bronze Pickaxe can only mine Copper and Tin but at a low chance (0-1 copper and 0-1 tin per click)
Iron Pickaxe can mine Copper and Tin as well but it will be a higher rate (1-3 copper and 1-3 tin per click)
The steel pickaxe is a pickaxe stronger than the iron pickaxe. It can be used in combat or in mining to mine rocks. The steel pickaxe requires Mining level 6 and Attack level 5 to wield.
It requires an Attack level of 20 to wield, and a Mining level of 21 to mine with. It can be used in combat or in mining to mine rocks.
The Adamant pickaxe is a pickaxe that is stronger than the mithril pickaxe, but weaker than the rune pickaxe. It requires an Attack level of 30 to wield, and a Mining level of 31 to mine with.
